channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A Big Storm
item.description: We explain what you can expect in the winter weather this week.

item.title: As Iran Grieves, Accounts Emerge of Disrespectful Treatment of Protest Victims
item.description: Witness testimony and videos from Tehran’s largest cemetery show disrespectful treatment of the dead after a brutal government crackdown.

item.title: 'Pain, betrayal, sadness': Danish veterans describe shock of Trump admin rhetoric
item.description: Danish veterans say the rhetoric from the Trump administration has been painful. They describe feeling betrayed and abandoned by an ally after standin...

item.title: 3 Things to Know About the TikTok Deal, and a New Protest Tactic in Minnesota
Who's Board of Peace and who's bored of peace? The quiz knows — do you?
item.description: Plus: The Oscars, tool-using animals, Nobel drama and more.

item.title: Ice may be more hazardous than snow this weekend. What to expect and how to prepare.
item.description: A major winter storm is expected to impact more than 200 million people in United States this weekend. Freezing rain and ice is a particular concern.

item.title: How cuts to federal climate funds could threaten polar vortex research
item.description: Tens of millions of people are in the path of a major winter storm. Federal cuts threaten efforts to understand the causes of such weather.

item.title: Millions of Americans brace for winter storm. And, Zelenskyy's warning for Europe

item.title: Trump Says He Bruised His Hand on a Table
item.description: The president also said he was prone to bruising because of the high dose of aspirin he has taken daily for three decades.

item.title: How Anger Erupted as Iranians Buried Protest Victims
item.description: As families buried those killed in Iran’s crackdown on anti-government protests, a Tehran cemetery became a flashpoint for dissent. A witness describe...
